author: EFE
title: El año 2024, el más cálido desde que existen registros
text:
Temperatura
El año 2024, el más cálido desde que existen registros
Se trata del primer año con una temperatura media 1,5°C por encima del nivel preindustrial
EFE
El año 2024 fue el más [cálido](/tags/calor/) documentado a nivel global desde que hay registros y el primero en que la temperatura media superó en 1,5°C el nivel preindustrial, informó este viernes el Servicio de Cambio Climático de Copernicus (C3S), el programa de observación de la Tierra de la Unión Europea.
El año pasado la [temperatura](/tags/temperaturas/) media del aire en superficie fue de 15,10ºC, lo que supone 0,72ºC por encima de la temperatura media entre 1991 y 2020, y 0,12°C más que en 2023, el anterior año más cálido de los registros, que se remontan a 1850, según informó este viernes esta institución con sede en Bonn (Alemania). Esto equivale a 1,60ºC por encima de la estimación de la temperatura entre 1850 y 1900, considerado el periodo preindustrial.
"La humanidad es dueña de su destino, pero nuestra respuesta al [desafío climático](/tags/crisis-climatica/) debe basarse en pruebas. El futuro está en nuestras manos; una acción rápida y decisiva aún puede cambiar la trayectoria de nuestro clima futuro", recalcó Carlo Buontempo, director del Servicio de Cambio Climático de Copernicus del Centro Europeo de Previsiones Meteorológicas a Plazo Medio (CEPMPM).
La temperatura media mensual superó en 1,5°C los niveles preindustriales durante once meses del año y yendo más atrás, todos los meses desde julio de 2023, e excepción de julio de 2024, superaron este umbral. Además, todos los meses de enero a junio fueron más cálidos que el mismo mes de cualquier año anterior y todos los meses de julio a diciembre fueron el segundo más cálido, por detrás del correspondiente de 2023. Agosto de 2024 empató con agosto de 2023 como el más cálido registrado.
"Cada año de la última década es uno de los diez más cálidos registrados. Estamos ya a punto de superar el nivel de 1,5°C definido en el Acuerdo de París y la media de los dos últimos años ya está por encima", señaló Samantha Burguess, responsable estratégica de Clima del CEPMPM.
Olas de calor sin precedentes y lluvias torrenciales
Agregó que "estas altas temperaturas globales, unidas a niveles récord de vapor de agua en la atmósfera mundial en 2024, se tradujeron en olas de calor sin precedentes y episodios de lluvias torrenciales, que han causado sufrimiento a millones de personas".
El año 2024 fue el más cálido para todos los continentes, excepto la Antártida y Australasia, así como para partes considerables de los océanos, en particular el Atlántico Norte, el Índico y el Pacífico occidental.
En lo que respecta a Europa, la temperatura media en 2024 se situó en 10,69°C, 1,47°C por encima de la media en el periodo de referencia entre 1991 y 2020 y 0,28°C más cálida que el récord anterior establecido en 2020.
Mientras, la temperatura media anual de la superficie del mar sobre el océano extrapolar alcanzó un máximo histórico de 20,87°C, 0,51°C por encima de la media de entre 1991 y 2020.
Las altas temperaturas de la superficie del mar fueron uno de los factores que más influyeron en la prevalencia de las altas temperaturas mundiales en 2023 y 2024.
Humedad récord
La cantidad total de vapor de agua en la atmósfera alcanzó un valor récord en 2024, al situarse un 5% por encima de la media de entre 1991 y 2020 y más de un 1% por encima de los años 2016 y 2023, en los que se habían registrado los dos valores más altos, respectivamente. Este abundante volumen de humedad amplificó el potencial de precipitaciones extremas y combinado con las altas temperaturas de la superficie del mar, contribuyó al desarrollo de grandes tormentas y ciclones tropicales.
Las temperaturas extremas y la elevada humedad pueden contribuir a aumentar los niveles de estrés térmico: a lo largo de 2024, gran parte del Hemisferio norte experimentó más días que la media con, al menos, "fuerte estrés térmico" y algunas zonas registraron más días que la media con "estrés térmico extremo", nivel en el que es imprescindible tomar medidas para evitar un golpe de calor.
El 10 de julio de 2024, alrededor del 44% de la superficie del planeta se vio afectada por un "estrés térmico" entre "fuerte" y "extremo", lo que supone un nuevo máximo anual récord y un 5% más de superficie del planeta en comparación con el máximo anual medio.
Por otra parte, los prolongados periodos secos en varias regiones generaron condiciones propicias para incendios forestales, que en el continente americano fueron persistentes y a gran escala. En cuanto a las emisiones de carbono de los incendios forestales, Bolivia y Venezuela tuvieron los niveles más altos jamás registrados.

author: Michelle Devani
title: How To Tell When Your Capricorn Man Has Moved On From You
text:
Maybe you have tried the ways to keep a capricorn man happy but in the end you failed and the relationship you had with him is over. It is okay, this is a journey for you and him to find the best partner for both of you. You are not capable of forcing the things that shouldn't be together.
Yet, both of you and him deserve to be happy with yourself, and with your future partner later on. In case you need more proof to convince you that you can't maintain the relationship you had, here are some ways on how to tell when your capricorn man has moved on.
Contents
Signs He Is Not Into You Anymore Here are some signs on how to tell when your capricorn man has moved on that you can see from your ex boyfriend.
1. Walk Away From You When someone has moved on from a relationship, he will walk away from you. He will walk away from you and the things that can remind him about you. This will help him to forget you easier, and this will show you that he already moved on and do not have any intention to go back with you. He has decided to move on and start a new life by the time he decided to walk away from you.
2. Not Protective Anymore Secondly, you may find your ex boyfriend as someone who is really protective about you because he wants to make sure your well being. This character may still appear when he still has a hope with the relationship that you guys had. But, once he doesn't, he will start to ignore you and careless. The one that you know as someone who is so protective about you will suddenly become a person who is not protective and careless to you.
3. Won't Ask You To Stay Capricorn man is not that type of guy who will ask you to stay once you decided to leave him. But then, just because most capricorn man has this trait, does not mean all of them will be like that. If you were with someone who don't ask you to stay or giving a second chance for the relationship that both of you had, you need to walk away and find the ways to make yourself happy after a break up .
4. Have More Works To Do You guys were apart for some time. And when you accidentally find him has more activities and works to do, this means that he has moved on. He was trying to involve himself into more works and activities so he will be able to forget you and start to create a new life when you are not with him anymore.
Move On Tips If you already knew that he has moved on from you, you also need to move on. Be happy because you deserve it. And if you think that there is no one better than him that you can get, you get yourself wrong. Please let go such a mindset.
1. Do Not Let Your Fantasy Grow First thing first to have a smooth and successful move on is by finding the ways to love yourself and be happy with the world . What you can do right now is by not letting your fantasy to grow wildly. Most of girls and woman who just broke up will go through the sad time where they keep remembering the memories they had with their ex.
By keep doing this useless thing, somehow you let your fantasy to grow. And, you will start to wonder whether you can have a better relationship with him if you get the second chance.
2. Accept The Past And Deal With It You will never be able to erase the memory unless you experience amnesia. The more you force yourself to forget him and all the memories you had, the harder it is for you to let him go and move on. You need to deal with your past and accept that the memories you had with your ex is a part of your life moments too.
3. Do Not Hate Your Ex I understand that there are a lot of personal reasons not to text your ex right after a breakup . But this does not mean that you should hate your ex. Hating your ex only shows that you are no better than him and this also show that you are worse without him. So prove it to yourself, that you are better than that. That's how to tell when your capricorn man has moved on.

author: malvern-online.com
title: KBRA Assigns Harris County Hospital District (TX) Series 2025 Limited Tax Bonds AA+, Stable Outlook
text:
KBRA assigns a long-term rating of AA+, with a Stable Outlook, to the Harris County Hospital District, TX (the "District") Limited Tax Bonds, Series 2025.
Key Credit Considerations
The rating was assigned because of the following key credit considerations:
Credit Positives
- The District is the primary safety net healthcare provider in the County and plays an essential role within the County’s public health mission.
- A growing tax base continues to generate strong property tax revenues for the District, thus supporting voter-authorized debt obligations.
- District’s ad valorem tax rate remains well below the constitutional limit.
Credit Challenges
- Large capital plan that will place upward pressure on operating expenses, debt requirements and the tax levy.
- Managing potential operational challenges should federal Medicaid funding materially decline.
Rating Sensitivities
For Upgrade
- Material growth in the property tax base, which supports the District’s revenue and operations and bolsters the taxing capacity within the Constitutional levy limit.
For Downgrade
- Significant secular deceleration or declines in tax base growth pressuring ad valorem tax support.
- Trend of sharply increasing operating deficits requiring substantial increases in the M&O tax rate.
To access ratings and relevant documents, click here.
Methodologies
Disclosures
A description of all substantially material sources that were used to prepare the credit rating and information on the methodology(ies) (inclusive of any material models and sensitivity analyses of the relevant key rating assumptions, as applicable) used in determining the credit rating is available in the Information Disclosure Form(s) located here.
Information on the meaning of each rating category can be located here.
Further disclosures relating to this rating action are available in the Information Disclosure Form(s) referenced above. Additional information regarding KBRA policies, methodologies, rating scales and disclosures are available at www.kbra.com.
About KBRA
Kroll Bond Rating Agency, LLC (KBRA), one of the major credit rating agencies (CRA), is a full-service CRA registered with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission as an NRSRO. Kroll Bond Rating Agency Europe Limited is registered as a CRA with the European Securities and Markets Authority. Kroll Bond Rating Agency UK Limited is registered as a CRA with the UK Financial Conduct Authority. In addition, KBRA is designated as a Designated Rating Organization (DRO) by the Ontario Securities Commission for issuers of asset-backed securities to file a short form prospectus or shelf prospectus. KBRA is also recognized as a Qualified Rating Agency by Taiwan’s Financial Supervisory Commission and is recognized by the National Association of Insurance Commissioners as a Credit Rating Provider (CRP) in the U.S.

author: Foodfaithfitness
title: Cilantro Lime Brown Rice Recipe
text:
Make a healthy side dish with this Cilantro Lime Brown Rice recipe—its citrus taste and aromatic scent will have you drooling for more.
Table of Contents
Lime and cilantro have a “together forever” thing going on that I just can’t get enough of. I have trouble adding one to a dish without adding the other. It’s almost Pavlovian how much I crave the aromatic flavor of cilantro whenever I taste the bright citrus that is the lime.
I’ve featured the pair a number of times in my recipes—
Cilantro Lime Quinoa, Cilantro Lime Cauliflower Rice, Cilantro Lime Grilled Shrimp—but given the numerous times these recipes can be used as side dishes, I wanted you to have as many options as possible. Hence, this recipe, which details how you would go about making a Cilantro-and-Lime–infused brown rice.
Is Cilantro Lime Brown Rice Healthy?
Brown rice is in the middle ground. It’s healthier than white rice, not as healthy as cauliflower rice. It does have nutrients and fiber but is also high in carbs. It’s suitable for vegetarian, vegan (replace the butter with plant-based oil), gluten-free, and dairy-free (replace the butter) diets.
INGREDIENTS
- 1 ½ cups brown rice, rinsed
- 3 cups water
- 1 tsp salt
- 2 cloves garlic, in their skins
- 1 tbsp butter
- 2 limes, juiced
- ½ cup cilantro, chopped
INSTRUCTIONS
Boil
Add the rice, water, salt, and garlic cloves to a pot. Cover with a lid and bring to a boil. Turn the heat down and simmer for 15 minutes. Turn off the heat and let sit with the lid on for another 10 minutes.
Squeeze
Remove the garlic from the rice. Squeeze the garlic out of the skin.
Melt
Add the butter to the rice. Stir until the butter has melted.
Mix
Add the cilantro and lime juice and mix.
DEVOUR!
Tips & Tricks to Making Perfect Cilantro Lime Brown Rice
- Rinse the rice before you boil it; this will remove excess starch and prevent it from becoming too sticky.
- For a milder, sweeter garlic flavor, consider roasting the cloves by putting them in foil with a little olive oil and warming them in the oven. Then add them to the rice, either minced or whole.
- For more citrus, add lime zest to the rice.
- Fluff the rice when mixing; if you stir too vigorously, you’ll damage many of the grains.
FAQs
Sure, though brown rice is healthier. Cooking times will differ between the two varieties so consult the instructions that come with your rice.
Rinse the pot before you use it. Giving the rice the occasional stir during cooking will also help, but don’t get too stir-happy.
Yes, I recommend olive oil, which will also bring with it a slight taste variation.
Sauté bell peppers, onions, or peas then add them to the rice.
Serving Suggestions
This rice dish goes well with a variety of proteins.
Juicy shrimp would taste good flavored with the lime and cilantro. You could make a casserole of sorts with this Cheesy Instant-Pot Chicken and Rice Casserole. To make a vegetarian meal, try this Easy Southwest Tofu Scramble (replace the cauliflower rice in this recipe with this brown rice). For a hearty, Mexican-inspired lunch, make a burrito bowl, with corn, onions, and peppers.
How to Prep and Store Cilantro Lime Brown Rice
Let the rice cool completely then store in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 5 days. You can also freeze it. And hold off adding the cilantro until you’re about to serve. Put the rice in a container or resealable freezer-safe bag. It should be okay for about 3 months. To reheat, let it thaw in the fridge overnight then cook in the microwave or stovetop with a little bit of water or broth.
Ingredients
- 1 ½ cups brown rice rinsed
- 3 cups water
- 1 tsp salt
- 2 cloves garlic in their skins
- 1 tbsp butter
- 2 limes juiced (+3 tbsp)
- ½ cup cilantro chopped
Instructions
- Add the rice, water, salt, and garlic cloves to a pot. Cover with a lid and bring to a boil. Turn the heat down and simmer for 15 minutes. Turn off the heat and let sit with the lid on for another 10 minutes.
- Remove the garlic from the rice. Squeeze the garlic out of the skin.
- Add the butter to the rice. Stir until the butter has melted.
- Add the cilantro and lime juice. Mix.
Tips & Notes:
- Rinse the rice before you boil it; this will remove excess starch and prevent it from becoming too sticky.
- For a milder, sweeter garlic, consider roasting the cloves by putting them in foil with a little olive oil and warming them in the oven. Then add them to the rice, either minced or whole.
- For more citrus, add lime zest to the rice.

author: Abhijeet Christopher Loreng
title: Gayatri Jayanti 2024: Know Who is Gayatri Mata, the Date, Auspicious Time and Method of Worship | Times Now
text: The birth anniversary of Goddess Gayatri, who is considered the mother of Indian culture, is celebrated on the Ekadashi date of Shukla Paksha of the Jyeshtha month. This day is called Gayatri Jayanti. In Hindu religion, Goddess Gayatri is called Vedmata because all the Vedas are believed to have originated from her. Gayatri Jayanti 2024 Date This year Gayatri Jayanti will be celebrated on 17 June 2024. Lord Surya had handed over Mother Gayatri to Brahmaji, since then she is also called Brahmani. Goddess Gayatri is believed to be a storehouse of knowledge, that is why she is also called Gyan-Ganga. Gayatri Jayanti 2024 Mahurat According to the Panchang, the Ekadashi date of Shukla Paksha of Jyeshtha month will start from 04.43 am on 17 June 2024. Ekadashi Tithi will end on the following day i.e. June 18, 2024 at 06.24 am. Puja Muhurta - 08.53 am - 10.37 amWhy is Gayatri Jayanticelebrated? According to the Gayatri Samhita, ‘Bhasate Sataratam Loke Gayatri Trigunatmika’ i.e. Gayatri represents Mother Saraswati, Lakshmi and Kali. The Atharvavdea mentions about the seven benefits of life, people, animals, fame, wealth and Brahmavarchas that accrue from Mother Gayatri. By worshiping them, a person gets all kinds of happiness and good fortune in their life and one is blessed with a long, healthy and happy life. Significance of Gayatri JayantiAccording to the scriptures, Goddess Gayatri is present in the form of a life force within every living being on this earth, this is why Goddess Gayatri is considered the basis of all powers. It is believed that by worshiping Goddess Gayatri, the goddess of knowledge, on the day of Gayatri Jayanti, one gets the same virtue as studying the Vedas and this in turn strengthens the unity within the family, happiness always resides in the house and one’s knowledge and wisdom also increases. Gayatri Mantra Om Bhur Bhuvah Swah. Tat saviturvarenyam. Bhargo devasya dhimahi. Dhio yo naḥ prachodayat ॥ How Vedmata Gayatri appeared?According to religious texts, at the beginning of creation, Brahma Ji invoked Mother Gayatri. Which led to her making her appearance on this earth. All the gods together worshipped Mother Gayatri and gave her the title of Vedmata. Gayatri Mantra is also called Mahamantra. Chanting it can give all the happiness of the world to the devotee. This is the form of Vedmata Gayatri According to the scriptures, the form of Goddess Gayatri is very beautiful. She is known to be the Goddess of Vedic hymns. She has three heads that's why she is also called as Goddess of Trimurti. She is the embodiment of Goddess Saraswati, Goddess Parvati and Goddess Laxmi. Vedmata Gayatri is also called the combined incarnation of Goddess Parvati, Saraswati and Lakshmi. Goddess Gayatri holds the Vedas in one hand and a kamandalu in the other hand. She wears white clothes. It is believed that worshiping Goddess Gayatri brings all kinds of happiness and prosperity in one’s life.

author: Linda Hall
title: Wet, warm and sunny year for Netherlands « Euro Weekly News
text:
THE NETHERLANDS has enjoyed its wettest, warmest and sunniest year since records began in 1901. Figures from the Royal Netherlands Meteorological Institute (KNMI), released on December 29, revealed that approximately 1,060 millimetres of rain fell in 2023, compared with the 795-millimetre average registered at Holland’s 13 weather stations between 1991 and 2022.
Spring was exceptionally wet, with March registering twice as much rain as usual.
 Taxing moment for Dutch royal family Success for iPhone ban in Dutch secondary schools A wheely bad idea - prisoner escapes in a bin! The exact figure will be calculated at the end of January once the weather stations’ records have been completely analysed, the KNMI said.
There was also more sun in 2023, the meteorological institute’s records showed, with around 1,910 hours of sunshine compared with 1,774 in what it described as a “normal” year.
Coastal areas had the most sun, and Vlissingen – probably more familiar to English- speakers as Flushing – in the south, had 2,065 hours of sunshine with a particularly sunny June.
Although 2023 had an overall average temperature of 11.8 degrees, the year began with a record-breaking 16.9 degrees. This trend did not last and there were two amber alerts from the KNMI later in the month, with snow warnings in central and southern areas on January 20 and black ice in the south on January 26.
June was the sunniest and warmest yet recorded, although the summer’s highest temperature of 34.8 degrees was registered on July 9 in Arcen. The KNMI also had to issue storm warnings in late June as well as early July.
Again, autumn temperatures were the highest ever although rainfall was heavier than usual in October and November. Meanwhile, the minus-10.1 temperature recorded in Leeuwarden on December 2 was the year’s lowest.
 Linda Hall Originally from the UK, Linda is based in Valenca and is a reporter for The Euro Weekly News covering local news. Got a news story you want to share? Then get in touch at editorial@euroweeklynews.com.
Comments

author: @CPOfficialtx
title: AI’s Groundbreaking Journey in 2023: Transforming Healthcare, Business, and Media”
text: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has been making significant strides in various fields, and 2023 has been a pivotal year in showcasing its potential and impact. From healthcare innovations to advancements in entertainment and business, AI has demonstrated its versatility and transformative power. This article provides an overview of key developments in AI over the past year, underscoring how this technology is reshaping industries and influencing societal norms. AI in healthcare in a leap forward One of the most notable achievements of AI in 2023 was in the healthcare sector. Researchers and medical professionals have increasingly relied on AI for diagnosing diseases, personalizing treatments, and even predicting patient outcomes with greater accuracy. A breakthrough was the use of AI in treating ultrasonic brain illnesses, as reported by AniNews.in. This advancement has significantly reduced barriers to treatment, offering hope for more effective management of neurological conditions. Moreover, startups have been actively utilizing AI to predict responses to cancer drugs, as highlighted by The Wall Street Journal. This approach has the potential to revolutionize cancer treatment by tailoring therapies to individual patient needs, thus improving treatment efficacy and reducing side effects. AI’s impact on business and the economy AI’s influence extends beyond healthcare into the realms of business and economy. Microsoft’s AI developments have been likened to an ‘iPhone moment’, suggesting a major shift in the company’s trajectory and impact on the tech industry. As reported by Proactive Investors (US), this upgrade in Microsoft’s AI capabilities indicates a significant leap in how businesses can leverage AI for innovation and efficiency. Additionally, Forbes’ review of 2023 highlights AI’s role in various sectors, including risk management, hybrid work models, and environmental, social, and governance (ESG) considerations. AI’s ability to analyze vast amounts of data and provide insights has been invaluable for companies navigating complex market dynamics and evolving work environments. AI in entertainment and media The entertainment industry has also felt AI’s influence. ‘Gutfeld!’ discussed how AI actors could potentially address issues in Hollywood, suggesting a future where AI-generated performances might become commonplace. This development, covered by The Wrap (Video), opens up new possibilities for content creation, potentially reshaping the entertainment landscape. In the realm of intellectual property, AI’s role has sparked discussions, as seen in “Copyright in the Age of Artificial Intelligence” by Mind Matters. The conversation revolves around the legal and ethical implications of AI-generated content, highlighting the need for new frameworks to address these emerging challenges. Challenges and ethical considerations Despite its numerous benefits, AI’s rapid development has raised important questions about ethics and regulation. Issues such as data privacy, bias in AI algorithms, and the potential for misuse remain key concerns. Publications like JD Supra have emphasized the importance of navigating compliance trends and establishing a corporate culture of integrity in the age of AI. The New York Times’ lawsuit against Microsoft and OpenAI, as reported by various sources, underscores the complexities of AI concerning copyright laws. This case is a clear indicator of the legal challenges that lie ahead as AI continues to evolve and intersect with various aspects of society. The advancements in AI during 2023 have been remarkable, showcasing the technology’s potential to revolutionize multiple sectors. From healthcare to entertainment, AI’s applications are vast and varied, offering solutions to complex problems and opening up new possibilities. However, as AI continues to develop, it is crucial to address the accompanying ethical and legal challenges to ensure its benefits are maximized while minimizing potential harm. The progress made in 2023 sets the stage for further innovations and discussions in the years to come, marking an exciting era in the evolution of artificial intelligence.
